description.value:
Your power bends the space around you, letting you strike a distant foe, then forcing that foe back as you appear at its side to strike again.

Daily âœ¦ Psionic, Psychic, Teleportation, Weapon

Standard Action • Melee weapon + 3 reach

Target: One creature

Primary Attack: Constitution vs. Reflex

Hit: 5 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Miss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the space the target occupied before the slide. Make a secondary attack against the target.

Secondary Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.

Miss: Half damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.

Effect: You teleport 5 squares.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 45.

hit.detail: 5 + Constitution modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

miss.detail: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

effect.detail: You teleport to a square adjacent to the space the target occupied before the slide. Make a secondary attack against the target.

system.chatFlavor: Your power bends the space around you, letting you strike a distant foe, then forcing that foe back as you appear at its side to strike again.
